abstract: Gaëtan Bong (born 25 April 1988 in Sakbayeme, Cameroon) is a French-Cameroonian footballer who plays professionally for Olympiacos F.C. in Superleague Greece, as a defender.
comment: Gaëtan Bong (born 25 April 1988 in Sakbayeme, Cameroon) is a French-Cameroonian footballer who plays professionally for Olympiacos F.C. in Superleague Greece, as a defender.
